nodes.text: At some point after their mission to Ushruu, Han Solo and Chewbacca were given a mission to the planet Rendel, hired by Bellan. Thinking they needed to deliver a statue to an art collector who lived on Rendel, Bellan had actually sent the smugglers to Rendel in the hope that they would defeat her sister Zalla, who had overrun the planet using her powers.
